name: SOC2 Compliance Policy - Sample Implementation
description: Sample SOC2 compliance policy demonstrating trust services criteria

requirements.title: Security Controls Implementation
requirements.description: Implement and maintain comprehensive security controls
controls: CC1.1: COSO Principle 1 - Demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values
CC2.2: COSO Principle 5 - Demonstrates commitment to competence
CC3.1: COSO Principle 9 - Identifies and analyzes risk
CC4.1: COSO Principle 13 - Defines objectives and strategies
CC5.1: COSO Principle 17 - Identifies and manages financial and operating information
remediation_steps: Deploy encryption for data at rest and in transit

requirements.title: Change Management Process
requirements.description: Establish formal change management procedures for system changes
controls: CC8.1: COSO Principle 25 - Selects and develops control activities
CC9.1: COSO Principle 29 - Evaluates and communicates deficiencies
remediation_steps: Maintain change history and rollback procedures
Test changes in staging environment before production

requirements.title: Monitoring and Alerting Systems
requirements.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting for system health and security
controls: CC7.1: COSO Principle 21 - Considers all relevant information
